items.title: Activist Irenic takes a stake in Atkore, urges company to consider a sale
items.description: Irenic's stake comes at a critical inflection point for Atkore. It needs a CEO, has operational and capital challenges, and a poor market perception.

items.title: These stocks reporting next week have a history of posting earnings beats and rallying
items.description: Several companies slated to report their quarterly results next week have regularly posted higher-than-expected revenue and earnings.

items.title: These stocks are now oversold after Trump tariff threat sparks sell-off
items.description: Wall Street's most oversold stocks this week include PNC Financial Services and Lowe's.

items.title: The stock market is diving on Trump's threat of more China tariffs. Is this a good time to buy?
items.description: Wall Street is wondering if Trump's tariff threats on China following its rare earth export crackdown have teeth.

items.title: Long-dated bonds are starting to break higher, says Carter Worth
items.description: Carter Worth breaks down the charts on TLT.
